title: Processes
description: Monitor and manage running vibe-kanban processes

empty.title: No processes running
empty.description: Start an executor to see running processes here

killDialog.title: Confirm Kill
killDialog.singleDescription: Are you sure you want to kill process {{pid}}? This action cannot be undone.
killDialog.allDescription: Are you sure you want to kill all {{count}} processes? This action cannot be undone.

killError.title: Kill Failed
killError.description: Failed to kill processes. Please try again.
